EmailTemplate.name: February Emails 2018.Spring Invite 2-7-18
EmailTemplate.subject: 3/13/18 Introducing Spring Boot 2.0
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Please join us for the webinar, Introducing Spring Boot 2.0 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/mar-13-introducing-reactive-spring-boot-2-0-webinar?utm_source=digest&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=springboot2.0-q118]]> on March 13, 2018.
The highly anticipated Reactive Spring Boot 2.0 has arrived! We are excited to offer reactive programming with full web tier support with WebFlux, WebFlux.fn and client side HTTP, alongside the traditional blocking Spring MVC model.
The release of Reactive Spring Boot 2.0 debuts major new additional capabilities like micrometer.io. <[[http://micrometer.io/]]> It completely overhauls security, actuators, and the gradle plugin, as well as updating many naming conventions and data formats.
There is a lot to learn, so reserve your seat with Phil Webb and the Spring Boot team as they help you navigate the new bits. Build something meaningful with Spring Boot 2.0!
Presenter: Phil Webb, Spring Framework commiter at Pivotal
Date: Tuesday, March 13, 2018 Time: 5:00pm GMT / 9:00am PST / 12:00pm EST
Attend <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/mar-13-introducing-reactive-spring-boot-2-0-webinar?utm_source=digest&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=springboot2.0-q118]]>
We thank you in advance for joining us. The Pivotal Team
© 2018 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street <[[https://www.google.com/maps?q=875+Howard+Street&entry=gmail&source=g]]>, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA.
